description: The likelihood is that January 2017 will be the date to circle in your calendars.After Sherlock's 'still-a-gamble' first series was given an inauspicious summertime airing, the BBC realised what they were dealing with and switched to a heavily promoted New Year spot. Series 2 and 3 were both broadcast just after Christmas, and it looks like series 4 may follow suit.

newshead: Game of Thrones' Season 7 Production Will Start a Bit Later. Will the Air Date Pushed Back?
description: As if ten months is not long enough to wait for the new season of 'Game of Thrones', season 7 air date is now potentially pushed back. Showrunners David Benioff and D.B. Weiss revealed during a UFC podcast that production would start a little bit later than usual to capture the gloomy weather.

newshead: Friends is moving to Channel 5 in September - but only for five hours
description: Ten episodes of Friends will be shown on Channel 5 for five hours on Sunday 13 September between 12pm and 5pm to mark the showâ€™s 21st birthday.Joey, Rachel, Chandler, Monica, Phoebe and Ross have found a home on Comedy Central in recent years after Channel 4 ceased broadcasting the popular sitcom in 2010 after 15 years.

newshead: When will the second season of TVF Pitchers be released?
description: Naveen and Jitu visited BITS Pilani - Goa Campus on 6th September,2015 and confirmed publically that yes we'll be having a second season of the series next year, ie 2016.Arunabh himself has also hinted on a second series in his interview. Naveen told that in the second series he is going to become more money minded and fall for other girls. Basically he told that the story will become more filmy.
